subject: Attn: Online Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Online Beneficiary,
Your details information has been received and confirmed with what we
have in our database before we proceed to set up your Chase Bank of America
Personal Residential Online Account, we want to bring to your
notice the simple procedure to achieve this aim with our bank under my
supervision. first and foremost the origin of funds has previously
advised in my initial email was from the United Nation Organization on
unpaid payments from deposit funds from Africa, Asia and Eastern
Europe. Your name and contact Information was retrieved from the short
listed data on the file of the United Nation Organization.
If you try to recollect, you would remember conducted some businesses
in either of the mentioned three tier regions (Africa, Asia and
Eastern Europe) and 
the purpose of selection was randomly made by the
United Nation Organization. Our bank stands out from all the presently
distressed banks in United State and Northern America to enable the
payment of your overdue transaction that has been pending for the past
several years released.
I want you to clearly understand that, I am here to serve you
according to the instruction from FBI, Homeland Securities of States
and United Nation Organization in particular, Moreover, I am not here
to play any kind of joke with you. The clearances from Federal Reserve
Bank and US Treasury Department to enable your online Transfer go
smoothly has been issue to our Bank.
Meanwhile, you have to clearly understand that, before we can set up a
new Chase Bank of America, Personal Residential Online Account for you
here in our Bank, 
the activation fee must be paid by you and it will
reflect in our database and your original account which was instructed
from united nation will be activated.
You have to send the sum of $125 usd dollars iTunes Gift Card Or Steam
card Or Google gift card to activate your Chase Bank of America
Personal Residential Online Account
, this payment will be credited to
your online account before we can fully remit The amount value
of $25,000,000,00 This is why it is important that we first of all
receive the Bank of Africa Personal Residential Online Account
Activation fee in our bank, which in turn would record and file the
payment of $125 usd dollars iTunes card and forward the information to
our headquarters here in USA.
Then the funds would be received, in ITUNES registered into the system
and once it is sighted, then an instruction would be issued out to
that effect and the documentation would be formally presented to
Federal Reserve Bank just as described in my most recent
correspondence with you explaining.
Please, if you cannot afford to pay this US$125 iTunes Gift Card Or
Steam card Or Google gift card don’t reply to my e-mail; we don’t have
time to beg you to set up Chase Bank of America account Personal Residential
Online under our supervision. Once your buy the $125 usd dollars iTunes
card and make sure your send the
Copy of the $125 usd dollars iTunes card here in Our Mail Address Okay,
Redars,
Mrs.Jenny partck.
Chase Bank of America Personal Residential Onlin
Chase Bank of America

subject: Re: Attn: Online Beneficiary,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the setup of a Chase Bank of America Personal Online Account. I appreciate you providing me with the details and explaining the origin of funds from the United Nations.

I understand that there is an activation fee required to set up the account, and it needs to be paid in USD gift cards such as Steam or Google gift cards. Could you please provide more information about why these specific gift cards are needed for payment? How will they be used to activate my account?

Additionally, could you clarify how long it will take for the activation process to be completed once the payment is made? I want to ensure that everything goes smoothly and efficiently.

Best wishes,
Mark

subject: Re: Attn: Online Beneficiary,
body:
Hello my Dear,ok but you have to try and send the Apple card $125 for
activation fee before you funds will be transfer to your bank account today.


Redars,
Mrs.Jenny partck.
Chase Bank of America Personal Residential Onlin

subject: Re: Attn: Online Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Patrick,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What is the Apple card for and how does it work? How much is the activation fee?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mark
